title: How to Powergame in the Elder Scrolls Morrowind

steps.headline: Choose Luck and Endurance as your primary attributes when creating your character.
steps.description: This will give you maximum health and maximum luck.

steps.headline: Choose Alchemy as a major skill, certainly a power-gaming tool.
Whenever you level up, always put a point into luck and endurance to continue to maximize luck and health.
Make "Fortify Intelligence" potions, as alchemy skill and success is based on Intelligence.
Drink said potion, and repeat the process, creating a super-potion of Fortify Int.
After repeating the process many times over, the potions you make will be unrealistically powerful.
Now make potions to do whatever you want.
steps.description: Fortify attack, chameleon, resist fire, absorb magical, etc. They will allow you god-like powers without 'cheating'.

text: Choose Luck and Endurance as your primary attributes when creating your character. This will give you maximum health and maximum luck. Choose Alchemy as a major skill, certainly a power-gaming tool.  Whenever you level up, always put a point into luck and endurance to continue to maximize luck and health.  Make "Fortify Intelligence" potions, as alchemy skill and success is based on Intelligence.  Drink said potion, and repeat the process, creating a super-potion of Fortify Int.  After repeating the process many times over, the potions you make will be unrealistically powerful.  Now make potions to do whatever you want. Fortify attack, chameleon, resist fire, absorb magical, etc. They will allow you god-like powers without 'cheating'.
